text: The Decembrists () is a 1926 Soviet silent drama movie directed by Aleksandr Ivanovsky.Звезда пленительного бунтаДекабристы It stars Vladimir Maksimov, Yevgeni Boronikhin, and Varvara Annenkova. ==Actors== * Vladimir Maksimov as Emperor Alexander I * Yevgeni Boronikhin as Emperor Nicholas I * Varvara Annenkova as Polina Gebl-Annenkova * Boris Tamarin as Decembrist Ivan Alexandrovich Annenkov * Tamara Godlevskaya - Countess Ekaterina Ivanovna Trubetskaya == References == ==Other websites== * Category:Russian drama movies Category:Russian silent movies Category:Soviet drama movies Category:Soviet silent movies Category:1926 drama movies Category:1920s historical movies Category:Movies set in the 19th century Category:Movies directed by Aleksandr Ivanovsky
title: The Decembrists (movie)
